select t2.f_region_num,t1.count ,t2.f_region_name,t2.f_pid,f_initial from (select
f_province_id
f_city_id
f_region_id
,count(*) as count FROM t_fish_site where f_status = 1
group by f_province_id
group by f_city_id
group by f_region_id
) t1 right join t_sys_cfg_region t2 on
t1.f_province_id
t1.f_city_id
t1.f_region_id
= t2.f_region_num

select f_id,t2.f_region_num,f_region_name,f_pid,f_initial from (select f_region_num from t_sys_cfg_region where f_pid = 0) t1 join t_sys_cfg_region t2 on t1.f_region_num = t2.f_pid order by f_initial asc

select t2.f_region_num,t1.count ,t2.f_region_name,t2.f_pid,f_initial from (select
f_fish_shop_province_id
f_fish_shop_city_id
f_fish_shop_region_id
,count(*) as count FROM t_fish_shop where f_fish_shop_status = 1
group by f_fish_shop_province_id
group by f_fish_shop_city_id
group by f_fish_shop_region_id
) t1 right join t_sys_cfg_region t2 on
t1.f_fish_shop_province_id
t1.f_fish_shop_city_id
t1.f_fish_shop_region_id
= t2.f_region_num
